name: Spaoter
description:
(AI BROKEN)

In this game, you shoot at other ships. When they run out of health, they become allies and shoot at other ships with you.

You can also customize your ship colors.

Enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

Accelerate: (W) Key / Up Key / Right Click

Stop Ship: (S) Key / Down Key / Middle Click

Shoot: Space Bar / Left Click

Close Game: ESC key
